name: Execution DLL of Choice Using WAB.EXE
description: This rule detects that the path to the DLL written in the registry is different from the default one. Launched WAB.exe tries to load the DLL from Registry.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\Software\\Microsoft\\WAB\\DLLPath) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:%CommonProgramFiles%\\System\\wab32.dll)))`
